name: d3-dispatch
description: Register named callbacks and call them with arguments.

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && d3-bundler -n dispatch -o build/dispatch.js && uglifyjs build/dispatch.js -c -m -o build/dispatch.min.js && rm -f build/dispatch.zip && zip -j build/dispatch.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/dispatch.js build/dispatch.min.js
